title: Java
subTitle: Enterprise-Grade Back-End Development
overviewContent: Over 8 years of professional experience leveraging Java to architect, develop, and maintain robust enterprise back-end systems. Skilled in applying object-oriented principles and design patterns to multi-tier architectures, integrating with complex third-party APIs, and optimising high-traffic, mission-critical applications. Adept at refactoring legacy systems for scalability and maintainability, ensuring long-term operational stability in corporate environments.
